data.name: A Pirate's Pleasure - Bonus Stories
data.detailed_description:
Return to the swashbuckling world of A Pirate’s Pleasure! These three all-new short stories, full of adventure and emotion, give tantalizing glimpses of the men you love and the lives they led before the beginning of the game.

  • Who was Alexander Eden before he arrived in the Caribbean? In “The Eve of Departure,” he prepares to set out from England, contemplating the kind of governor—and man—he wants to become.
  • Caleb Black and Nathaniel Wren meet for the first time, sharing “A Not So Quiet Drink”, and recognizing that despite their differences, they’re kindred spirits when it comes to their piratical ambition.
  • The pirate crew of the Clio find a rich target - and a noble who greatly deserves to be robbed - when they set out to steal “The Redcliffe-Reid Jewels.”
